players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Charlie was killed, so we know there's a mafia among us. Diana, Bob, let's share our thoughts on who we suspect."
Diana: "I think we should all share our roles to help identify the mafia. I'm a villager."
You: "I am also a villager. Bob, what is your role?"
Bob: "Alice, I investigated you last night and you're the mafioso. We must vote you out to win."
Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of someone more suspicious? That seems like a waste of an investigation."

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Alice: "Charlie was killed, so we know there's a mafia among us. Diana, Bob, let's share our thoughts on who we suspect."
Diana: "I think we should all share our roles to help identify the mafia. I'm a villager."
Alice: "I am also a villager. Bob, what is your role?"
You: "Alice, I investigated you last night and you're the mafioso. We must vote you out to win."
Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of someone more suspicious? That seems like a waste of an investigation."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
